text:
Hello everybody, i'm creating a custom template from HubSpot Hubl area. Basically i wanted to display many informations from HubSpot contact page ( variables ). example : name, email etc ...

All those info after connecting user to a restricted area.

What i need now is to display many variables/properties from *Pennylane* ( API ). If anybody have experience on that to know what i can display, and how difficult is it to do it.

Thank you
